name: Secret Coffer
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one small chest or coffer and up to 1 cu. ft. of goods
text: This spell functions like secret chest, except the coffer is only 1 foot square and can contain only 1 cubic foot of goods, and the container can remain safely hidden on the Ethereal Plane for only 14 days before it risks becoming lost. The spell automatically fails if a living creature enters the coffer. The coffer used as a focus for secret coffer must cost at least 500 gp, and its replica costs 5 gp.
target_zh: 一个小柜子或保险柜，与最高1立方呎的货物
text_zh: 此法术同秘藏箱(Secret Chest)般运作，除了此柜仅有1平方呎大，并只能包含1立方呎的货物，并且在面临遗失的风险前，只能在灵界(Ethereal Plane)安全的藏着14天。如果有任何活物进入此柜，此法术自动失败。作为秘藏柜的柜子必须花费至少500gp，并且它的复制品要花费5gp。
